field.label: Domain
field.help: Select a Domain, to which the handle should be added.

field.label: Subdomain
field.help: Optionally, select a Subdomain, to which the handle should be added.

field.label: Handle Path
field.help: Enter the handle, e.g. '/*' or '/example/*' or leave empty for a catch all handle

field.label: To Domain
field.help: Enter the domain name or IP address to the backend server destination of this handle (e.g., 'example.com').

field.label: To Port
field.help: Enter the port number to the backend server destination of this handle (e.g., '9000').

field.label: Description
field.help: Enter a description for this handle entry.
